changeSet.sql: UPDATE timer SET natural_key = CONCAT( COALESCE( (SELECT string_agg(methods, ',') FROM jsonb_array_elements_text( (timer_descriptor->'routingEntry'->>'methods')::jsonb ) AS methods), ''), '#', COALESCE( timer_descriptor->'routingEntry'->>'path', timer_descriptor->'routingEntry'->>'pathPattern' ) );

WITH ranked_rows AS ( SELECT id, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY natural_key ORDER BY id) AS rn FROM timer ) DELETE FROM timer USING ranked_rows WHERE timer.id = ranked_rows.id AND ranked_rows.rn > 1;
